entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
